DataElement.preferredName: Patient Stay Out of Bed Assessment Hour Duration
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Having determined the period of time, in hours, of a patient's ability to maintain the energy required to be out of bed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Stay Out of Bed Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Having determined the value, significance, or extent of a patient's ability to maintain the energy required to be out of bed.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Concepts.definition: The ability to maintain the energy required to be out of bed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The period of time, in hours, during which something continues.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: In modern usage, an hour is defined as a unit of time 60 minutes, or 3600 seconds in length. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.:The period of time during which something continues.

Concepts.definition: A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.
The period of time during which something continues.
